section.title: The Edit Agreements Roles help screen
section.para: This screen is used to assign a party roles for an agreement.

section.title: How do I add a party role to an agreement?

listitem.para: Use the lookup to select the 'Party Id'
Use the drop down box to select the 'Party Role Id'
Press the 'Add' button (NOTE: If the party does not have this role associated with them then an error will be displayed)
The new entry will be displayed in the lower part of the screen

section.title: How do I update a party role for an agreement?
section.para: Party roles can only be added and deleted. They cannot be updated.

section.title: How do I delete a party role from an agreement?

listitem.para: Press the 'Remove' button for the entry that needs to be deleted.
